extension.description: Parametric Equalizer with constant Q peaking filters (BiQuads or Second Order Sections). It's very flexible, because you can configure several pre- or postprocessing modes with variable Bands. E.g. postprocessing mode with 10 Bands. For better configuration of the gain of each audio band it uses peaklevel meters.
